sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.

backtrans: The President urged his ministers to meet as an important opposition of his economic system would begin to roll.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
